${modID}:AStepAhead.NAME: A Step Ahead
${modID}:AStepAhead.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, gain !M! Block.
${modID}:AStepAhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you draw a card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:AgreeToDisagree.NAME: Agree To Disagree
${modID}:AgreeToDisagree.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Vulnerable stacks from target enemy. Gain that much Dexterity.

${modID}:AtALoss.NAME: At A Loss
${modID}:AtALoss.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${modID}:BadAttitude.NAME: Bad Attitude
${modID}:BadAttitude.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, ALL enemies gain !M! Poison.

${modID}:BuyThemADrink.NAME: Buy Them A Drink
${modID}:BuyThemADrink.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison for each stack of Weak and Vulnerable.

${modID}:CharismaForm.NAME: Charisma Form
${modID}:CharismaForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. At the start of each turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Confidence.
${modID}:CharismaForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Confidence.

${modID}:Condescend.NAME: Condescend
${modID}:Condescend.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak.

${modID}:CuttingWords.NAME: Cutting Words
${modID}:CuttingWords.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Deal an additional !D! damage per stack of ${modID}:Confidence.

${modID}:DanceOnEm.NAME: Dance On 'Em
${modID}:DanceOnEm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ALL enemies lose !M! Strength and gain !M! Weak. Exhaust.

${modID}:Diatribe.NAME: Diatribe
${modID}:Diatribe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Dissuade.NAME: Dissuade
${modID}:Dissuade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Cachet: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

${modID}:Entitlement.NAME: Entitlement
${modID}:Entitlement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card.

${modID}:FieryTemper.NAME: Fiery Temper
${modID}:FieryTemper.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

${modID}:Gossip.NAME: Gossip
${modID}:Gossip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ImperiousAffect.NAME: Imperious Affect
${modID}:ImperiousAffect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Inheritance.NAME: Inheritance
${modID}:Inheritance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, draw a card.
${modID}:Inheritance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you play a power, draw a card.

${modID}:Insulate.NAME: Insulate
${modID}:Insulate.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Block for every stack of every debuff on target enemy.

${modID}:InsultToInjury.NAME: Insult To Injury
${modID}:InsultToInjury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you play a skill, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.

${modID}:Patron.NAME: Patron
${modID}:Patron.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, add a random power card into your hand.

${modID}:PracticedAffect.NAME: Practiced Affect
${modID}:PracticedAffect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill, gain !M! block.
${modID}:PracticedAffect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you play a skill, gain !M! block.

${modID}:Purify.NAME: Purify
${modID}:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Cachet: Exhaust every Status and Curse card in your hand and discard pile.

${modID}:RiskyBiscuit.NAME: Risky Biscuit
${modID}:RiskyBiscuit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${modID}:Cachet: Costs 1 [E] less per stack of ${modID}:Confidence.

${modID}:Schadenfreude.NAME: Schadenfreude
${modID}:Schadenfreude.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy receives a debuff, gain !M! block.

${modID}:ShoppingSpree.NAME: Shopping Spree
${modID}:ShoppingSpree.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, gain !M! block.

${modID}:SillyAffect.NAME: Silly Affect
${modID}:SillyAffect.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:SocialClimber.NAME: Social Climber
${modID}:SocialClimber.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill that costs 0, draw !M! card(s).

${modID}:WeightRoom.NAME: Weight Room
${modID}:WeightRoom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill this turn, gain !M! Strength.
